T02TD2631E:124b-1: shr'i sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni mandala no pi ka kri ba aa ba li n'a ma /
T02TD2631E:124b-3: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thugs rje phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2631E:124b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2631E:124b-5: dpal gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyi sku //
T02TD2631E:124b-6: nyon mongs mtha' dag kun bcom nas //
T02TD2631E:124b-7: 'gro la thugs rjes spyan gyis rab gzigs la //
T02TD2631E:124b-8: kun nas dang ba'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2631E:124b-9: skye ba brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal gcod byed pa'i //
T02TD2631E:125a-2: de la bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnal 'byor pa snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dam tshig thams cad bsdu bar gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125a-3: de la dang po rnal 'byor pa sems dad pas mchog tu gyur pa dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas //
T02TD2631E:125a-5: sems can thams cad kyi don du sems bskyed la /
T02TD2631E:125a-6: dri la sogs pas khrus byas pas /
T02TD2631E:125a-7: chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125a-8: de nas mgrin pa'i phyogs su pam las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
T02TD2631E:125a-9: de'i lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2631E:125a-10: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams nas //
T02TD2631E:125a-13: yang dag pa gnyis la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rer gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2631E:125a-16: de'i rjes la rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2631E:125a-17: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2631E:125a-18: de nas aom sarba yo ga badzr'a ya h'um /
T02TD2631E:125a-19: zhes pas yan lag thams cad rdo rjer gyur par bsam /
T02TD2631E:125a-20: de nas bgegs gzhil bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2631E:125a-21: de la h'um las sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ru bdag nyid sprul la /
T02TD2631E:125a-22: rdo rje me'i nyi ma rab tu bsams nas /
T02TD2631E:125a-23: khros pa'i sems kyis khro bo ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:125a-24: de la rdo rje mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni /
T02TD2631E:125a-25: ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2631E:125a-26: grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2631E:125a-29: de nas rdo rje'i gdan phyed du 'dug la /
T02TD2631E:125a-30: dang po'i phyag rgya de nyid du bcing ste /
T02TD2631E:125a-31: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar byas la /
T02TD2631E:125a-32: dar dpyangs kyis brgyan par bya zhing /
T02TD2631E:125a-33: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinyts'a mam /
T02TD2631E:125a-35: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis mdud cing /
T02TD2631E:125b-0: yang snying ga la sogs par mdud pa las sna tshogs go @125b bgo bar byas la /
T02TD2631E:125b-1: g-yon pa dkur 'dzin par byas la /
T02TD2631E:125b-2: g-yas rdo rje gsor bas bgegs ma lus pa gzhom par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:125b-3: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um sarba bighn'an phat /
T02TD2631E:125b-5: de nas khro bo de nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar bar bya zhing mthe bong de bzhin du bsgreng bas /
T02TD2631E:125b-6: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2631E:125b-7: ces pas bgegs kyi chogs ma lus par bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-8: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste /
T02TD2631E:125b-9: aom badzra ne tre sarba bighn'am bandha /
T02TD2631E:125b-10: zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-11: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor rtse mo sprad de /
T02TD2631E:125b-12: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksham sarba sv'a h'a /
T02TD2631E:125b-13: zhes brjod pas sa 'og bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-14: rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa las g-yas pa sdigs mdzub tu bya zhing /
T02TD2631E:125b-15: g-yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2631E:125b-16: khros pa'i yid kyis khro bo de nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su spros pa las /
T02TD2631E:125b-17: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2631E:125b-18: ces pas steng phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-19: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje rtse sprad par byas la spyi bor btsugs nas /
T02TD2631E:125b-23: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mkhrig ma gnyis mdud de lho phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2631E:125b-24: aom badzra pra sha hri phat /
T02TD2631E:125b-25: ces pas lho phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-26: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa las gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de /
T02TD2631E:125b-27: srin lag gnyis tshigs bar ma bsnol nas mthe chung gnyis brkyang bar byas te /
T02TD2631E:125b-28: aom pa tadgi [*tanggi?] pa tadgi [*tanggi?] ni ra trat /
T02TD2631E:125b-29: ces pas nub phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-30: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya /
T02TD2631E:125b-31: mthe bong gnyis kha'i tshul du byas nas /
T02TD2631E:125b-33: zhes brjod pas byang phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:125b-34: de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyi bdag nyid las lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor bsnol /
T02TD2631E:125b-35: sor mo lhag ma drag pa so sor rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul las sa la bstan pas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bya zhing /
T02TD2631E:126a-3: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mthe chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng la phyogs bzhir bskyad pas ra dang po dang /
T02TD2631E:126a-4: de nyid las sdigs mdzub bzhi pas ra ba gnyis pa bya zhing /
T02TD2631E:126a-5: aom badzra pra ka ra h'um badzra h'um ka ra h'um /
T02TD2631E:126a-6: zhes pas rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126a-7: rdo rje bsdams pa rgyas par brkyang ba'i steng du bkab la bskyod de /
T02TD2631E:126a-9: zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i gur du bya ba nyid do //
T02TD2631E:126a-10: de'i rjes la me tog gi phyag rgya'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
T02TD2631E:126a-11: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mdzub mo dang mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te /
T02TD2631E:126a-12: aom sarba bid badzra tsakra h'um /
T02TD2631E:126a-13: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun brjod pas phyogs kun du bskor bas dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126a-14: de nyid snying ga'am khar bzhag la sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2631E:126a-15: de yis dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas la /
T02TD2631E:126a-16: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa dri dang /
T02TD2631E:126a-17: kha dog sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gyur pa'i steng du phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2631E:126a-20: khro bo la sogs pa thams cad de nyid du sprul la /
T02TD2631E:126a-21: kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas /
T02TD2631E:126a-22: kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs //
T02TD2631E:126a-23: gang phyir ngan song thams cad kyi //
T02TD2631E:126a-24: rgyud ni dag par byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD2631E:126a-25: zhes pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126a-26: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs sngon du 'gro bas zhabs bsil la aargha phul te /
T02TD2631E:126a-28: gdan la brtan par bzhugs te /
T02TD2631E:126a-29: thal mo legs par sbyar bas dpral ba'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02TD2631E:126a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'aktsitta pra na me na badzra tsakra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:126a-31: de nyid las mthe bong g-yas pa rdo rje ltar bsgreng pa snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD2631E:126a-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:126a-33: zhes brjod pas shar phyogs nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126a-34: de nyid las mdzub mo rin po che ltar byas pas snying gar bzung la /
T02TD2631E:126a-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:126b-0: zhes brjod @126b bas lho phyogs nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126b-1: mdzub mo padma ltar byas pas lkog mar bzung ste /
T02TD2631E:126b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta padma bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:126b-3: zhes brjod pas nub phyogs nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126b-4: mdzub mo ral gri ltar byas pa lte bar bzung ste /
T02TD2631E:126b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta karma bandha nam kva ro mi /
T02TD2631E:126b-6: zhes brjod pas byang phyogs nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2631E:126b-7: de nas mchod pa thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2631E:126b-8: me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:126b-10: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na me tog gi bye brag gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD2631E:126b-13: yid las byung ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ma lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2631E:126b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:126b-20: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa nyi shu gzhung gzhan dang mthun par dbul lo //
T02TD2631E:126b-21: gzhan yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02TD2631E:126b-22: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:126b-24: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi bye brag 'di lta ste /
T02TD2631E:126b-25: bza' ba dang bca' ba dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-26: bldag pa dang myang ba dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-27: btung ba dang gzhib pa dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-28: bdud rtsir gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams ma lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-30: byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:126b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2631E:126b-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ra sa a'a ha ra na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:126b-36: de bzhin du lha dang mi rnams kyi bzhon pa'i bye brag khyad par can rta dang glang po la sogs pa dang skyes pa dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-3: dmag mi rnams kyis nam mkha' rgyas par lhag par mos par /
T02TD2631E:127a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sapta ratna p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:127a-5: rang gi sems yid bzhin nor bu las byung ba'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad du gdugs dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-7: ba dan rnams kyis rgyas par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2631E:127a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsha tram dhva dza p'a dam ka p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:127a-9: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du /
T02TD2631E:127a-12: me tog dang phreng ba la sogs par rgyas par byas la /
T02TD2631E:127a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta khadga a'a darsha pushpa m'a le p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:127a-14: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du /
T02TD2631E:127a-19: gar la sogs pas rgyas par byas la /
T02TD2631E:127a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta g'i tirba tur ya p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:127a-21: de ltar mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa thams cad yang dag par bshags par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:127a-22: bus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD2631E:127a-23: rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bsnol nas mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2631E:127a-24: lhag ma gsum thal mor byas pas snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD2631E:127a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-31: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-36: bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2631E:127a-37: bdag rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
T02TD2631E:127a-39: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-43: padma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:127a-44: phyag rgya dang gsar sngags dang /
T02TD2631E:127b-0: bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams @127b cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o zhes brjod la /
T02TD2631E:127b-1: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:127b-4: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:127b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2631E:127b-8: sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams la rgya cher yi rang bar bgyi /
T02TD2631E:127b-9: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa rnams la /
T02TD2631E:127b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad du gsol /
T02TD2631E:127b-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
T02TD2631E:127b-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa de dag thams cad /
T02TD2631E:127b-13: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD2631E:127b-14: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad /
T02TD2631E:127b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la gnas par bgyi'o //
T02TD2631E:127b-16: de nas gsum la skyabs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2631E:127b-17: me tog lag par thogs la /
T02TD2631E:127b-19: bla med bcom ldan rkang gnyis mchog / rdo rje lta bu'i sangs rgyas te //
T02TD2631E:127b-20: bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la //
T02TD2631E:127b-21: bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2631E:127b-22: rnam par dag pa chags pa mchog / padma lta bu dam chos te //
T02TD2631E:127b-23: nges gsung sngags dang phyag rgya la //
T02TD2631E:127b-24: bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2631E:127b-25: rnam grol gtsang ma tshogs kyi mchog / rin chen lta bu dge 'dun te //
T02TD2631E:127b-26: lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2631E:127b-27: bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2631E:127b-28: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2631E:127b-29: yang dag byang chub skyed mdzad bzhin //
T02TD2631E:127b-30: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD2631E:127b-31: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2631E:127b-32: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2631E:127b-33: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2631E:127b-34: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2631E:127b-35: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2631E:127b-36: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:127b-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2631E:127b-38: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2631E:127b-39: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:127b-40: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2631E:127b-41: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2631E:127b-42: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:128a-0: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar @128a * //
T02TD2631E:128a-2: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2631E:128a-3: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2631E:128a-4: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD2631E:128a-5: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2631E:128a-6: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2631E:128a-7: padma'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2631E:128a-8: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2631E:128a-9: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung //
T02TD2631E:128a-10: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2631E:128a-11: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2631E:128a-12: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:128a-13: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2631E:128a-14: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2631E:128a-15: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD2631E:128a-16: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2631E:128a-17: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2631E:128a-18: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:128a-19: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2631E:128a-20: dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD2631E:128a-21: dbyugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2631E:128a-22: de ltar sdom pa bzung nas /
T02TD2631E:128a-23: bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:128a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2631E:128a-29: las kyi ris su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:128a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis /
T02TD2631E:128a-34: bdag dus thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo //
T02TD2631E:128a-35: zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du /
T02TD2631E:128a-36: lus rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa spros pas so so'i zhabs drung du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:128a-37: de nas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02TD2631E:128a-38: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol lo zhes brjod la /
T02TD2631E:128a-39: dge ba de yang sems can thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:128a-41: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis /
T02TD2631E:128a-42: bdag dang sems can thams cad /
T02TD2631E:128a-44: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i bde ba dang ;
T02TD2631E:128a-45: yid bde ba thams cad kyi mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la thob par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la /
T02TD2631E:128a-46: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la /
T02TD2631E:128a-47: sems chen pos dmigs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2631E:128a-48: de las 'don par 'dod pa'i bla na med pa'i sems dang /
T02TD2631E:128b-0: 'phags pa'i @128b chos kyis yongs su grol ba'i sems mchog tu gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:128b-1: dngos po thams cad la dmigs pa med pa mthar thug pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:128b-2: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba tsam dngos po kun gyi mchog tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:128b-3: de'i rjes la sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:128b-4: aom na mo bha ga ba ti tsitta sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a y'arha te /
T02TD2631E:128b-7: aom sho dha ya sho dha ya /
T02TD2631E:128b-9: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2631E:128b-11: lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2631E:128b-12: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rdo rje rtse mor gyur pa rnams kyi steng du bsams la /
T02TD2631E:128b-13: de dag gi steng du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g-yas pa la bsam pa dang /
T02TD2631E:128b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g-yon pa la bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:128b-15: de la mthe bong gnyis la /
T02TD2631E:128b-17: mdzub mo gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba bsam /
T02TD2631E:128b-18: gung mo gnyis la tr'am zhes bya ba bsam /
T02TD2631E:128b-19: srin lag gnyis la dhi zhes bya ba bsam /
T02TD2631E:128b-20: mthe bong gnyis la a'a zhes bya ba bsam /
T02TD2631E:128b-21: de ltar de dag yongs su gyur ba las /
T02TD2631E:128b-22: rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o ;
T02TD2631E:128b-23: / de nyid gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das lnga dang /
T02TD2631E:128b-26: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu r'a ga sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2631E:128b-28: thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:128b-29: de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2631E:128b-30: aom aa n+yo n+ya spha ra spha ra aa nu bra bishta sarba dharm'a sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2631E:128b-31: zhes brjod pas thabs dang shes rab thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:128b-33: aom aa tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: h'um /
T02TD2631E:128b-35: chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres shing thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po la thugs ye shes kyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2631E:128b-36: de la badzra aanydza li bya bas /
T02TD2631E:128b-37: rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02TD2631E:128b-42: ces brjod pas snying gar sdig pa lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-1: bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:129a-2: aa zhes pas bdag nyid la ye shes dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-3: phab pa de nyid 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-4: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa sha shva to me bha ba hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhimme pra yatstsha h'um /
T02TD2631E:129a-5: ha ha ha ha ho: badzra mushti /
T02TD2631E:129a-7: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:129a-10: de'i rjes la rdo rje phyag rgya nang du bcas la /
T02TD2631E:129a-13: aom p'a bam a'a karsha ni bi sho dha na bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2631E:129a-15: aom badzra p'a ni spho ta ya sarba aa p'a ya bandha ni pra mo ksha na sarba aa p'a ya ga te bhya: sarba tr'a sa nan sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trat /
T02TD2631E:129a-16: ces brjod la gung mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar la /
T02TD2631E:129a-17: gzhan ma bzhi po rtse mo sprad de sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-18: de nas chos thams cad rab tu bsdu ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:129a-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod de /
T02TD2631E:129a-20: aom sarba mu: zhes pas dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-21: de nyid kyis ni dngos grub thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su 'og min gyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2631E:129a-22: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02TD2631E:129a-23: rang gi lha'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02TD2631E:129a-24: rang gi lha'i snying po dam tshig gis bris la /
T02TD2631E:129a-25: de nyid la mngon par phyogs pa'i lte ba'i dbus su dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa /
T02TD2631E:129a-26: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:129a-27: yang de'i steng du yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2631E:129a-28: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-29: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du /
T02TD2631E:129a-30: badzra zhes bya ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2631E:129a-31: de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129a-32: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rang rang gi snying po las byung ba'i mtshan ma ste /
T02TD2631E:129b-0: de dag @129b gi dbus su snying po rnams bkod la rang rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02TD2631E:129b-4: rang rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas par bzhugs pa rnams /
T02TD2631E:129b-5: rang rang gi phyag rgya la bzhugs par bsams te /
T02TD2631E:129b-6: badzra tsakra sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
T02TD2631E:129b-7: zhes pa zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de rnams /
T02TD2631E:129b-8: badzra bee ro tsa na ra ham /
T02TD2631E:129b-9: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi /
T02TD2631E:129b-10: rang rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgoms la /
T02TD2631E:129b-11: aom sho dha na sho dha ne sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ne h'um /
T02TD2631E:129b-12: brjod la ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02TD2631E:129b-13: zhes pas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings shing sa ma ya ham /
T02TD2631E:129b-15: de nas snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas bzhir rdo rje la sogs pa /
T02TD2631E:129b-20: de nas rang gi snying gar 'khor lo'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i badzra tsakra /
T02TD2631E:129b-21: zhes pa'i snying pos ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor de ma thag tu sprul la sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2631E:129b-23: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2631E:129b-24: de yis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02TD2631E:129b-25: snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du badzra sa ma ya /
T02TD2631E:129b-28: zhes pas dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129b-29: de nas aom pra ti grihna tva me sarba ma h'a ba la /
T02TD2631E:129b-30: zhes bya bas phreng ba blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129b-31: de nas bdag nyid kyi ma rig pa bsal bar bsams te /
T02TD2631E:129b-32: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2631E:129b-33: de ring bdag gis mig dbye mdzad //
T02TD2631E:129b-34: rdo rje mig ni bla med pas //
T02TD2631E:129b-35: mig rnams thams cad dbye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2631E:129b-37: mig phye la he badzra pa shya /
T02TD2631E:129b-39: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad bla mar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:129b-40: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje chu blangs nas /
T02TD2631E:129b-43: chu'i dbang blangs nas de nas sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2631E:129b-44: phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbang buddha aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02TD2631E:129b-45: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2631E:130a-2: aom padma aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD2631E:130a-3: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa a'a:/
T02TD2631E:130a-4: zhes pa'i spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar bde bar gshegs pa lngas dbu rgyan bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130a-5: de bzhin du phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2631E:130a-12: bde ba chen po'i dbang rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nos la /
T02TD2631E:130a-15: snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du go bgo bar bya zhing /
T02TD2631E:130a-16: dar dbyangs kyis brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130a-19: lung bstan pa la sogs pa thams cad rgyas par byas nas rang la byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2631E:130a-20: rnal 'byor chen po la brtson par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:130a-21: de la rang gi snying gar zla ba bsams la ma ya a'a zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2631E:130a-22: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2631E:130a-23: aom sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
T02TD2631E:130a-24: zhes pas mdun gyi nam mkha' bee ro tsa na aa zhes brjod la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130a-25: badzra be zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2631E:130a-26: badzra bee ro ca na ham /
T02TD2631E:130a-28: phyag rgya dang rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar por bsgoms te /
T02TD2631E:130a-29: rang gi gnas su dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130a-30: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:130a-31: aom badzra bee ro tsa na dandre /
T02TD2631E:130a-32: zhes bya bas blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130a-33: de bzhin du sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2631E:130a-37: zhes pa la sogs pas gnas lngar rdo rje la sogs phyag rgyas gyur cing /
T02TD2631E:130a-38: badzra aa p'a ya sho dha ni h'um /
T02TD2631E:130a-40: bde bar gshegs pa'i skur gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2631E:130a-41: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:130b-3: zhes pas snying po phab la /
T02TD2631E:130b-4: de nas de dag gyur par gzugs phyag rgya dag ste /
T02TD2631E:130b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' nas dril bu'i bar du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2631E:130b-10: de nas da nyid so so'i bar phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsam bar bya ba bzhin /
T02TD2631E:130b-14: zhes pa'i bar gyis ngan song thams cad dang pos yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su rang gi rigs las nye bar mtshon pa'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan bsnams pas gnas par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:130b-15: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2631E:130b-17: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa byas nas so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2631E:130b-18: snying po rnams brjod pas blta bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:130b-22: zhes pa'i bar gyis blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130b-23: de nas rang gi lus la phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2631E:130b-24: sngags kyi sbyor ba bsdus pa las /
T02TD2631E:130b-25: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD2631E:130b-26: phyag rgya bzhes rgyas gdab par bya ba ste /
T02TD2631E:130b-27: badzra tsakra dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2631E:130b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun brjod la /
T02TD2631E:130b-30: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2631E:130b-33: me tog rgyas pa rnams kyi snying po brjod la sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pas /
T02TD2631E:130b-34: aom buddha lo tsa ni h'um /
T02TD2631E:130b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:130b-36: rnal 'byor chen pos ni gzhal yas khang la sogs pa med pa yang mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed la /
T02TD2631E:130b-37: cho ga thams cad spyad par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:130b-38: mngon du byed pa pos ni /
T02TD2631E:130b-39: de'i rjes la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid las byung ba phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi la sbyar bar byas te /
T02TD2631E:130b-40: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas na /
T02TD2631E:130b-41: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings byas la //
T02TD2631E:130b-42: de nyid lte bar ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2631E:130b-43: de las mthe bong mthe chung mdud //
T02TD2631E:130b-44: mdzub mo srin lag rin chen 'dra //
T02TD2631E:130b-45: mthe bong mthe chung pad snying po //
T02TD2631E:131a-2: de bzhin ral gri 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-3: mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-4: gung mo dag ni rin chen te //
T02TD2631E:131a-7: mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba las //
T02TD2631E:131a-8: de nyid lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug / me tog mda' gzhu 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-9: legs so zhes par brjod pa ni //
T02TD2631E:131a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yin //
T02TD2631E:131a-11: mdzub mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-12: mthe bong gshibs te gzhan rnams bsnol //
T02TD2631E:131a-13: de las srin lag mthe chung gnyis //
T02TD2631E:131a-14: mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan te //
T02TD2631E:131a-15: de las bskor te kha phyogs gzhag / srin lag padma chos kyi ste //
T02TD2631E:131a-16: srin lag ral gri rnon po yin //
T02TD2631E:131a-17: lag gnyis mtheb mdzub zlum po ni //
T02TD2631E:131a-18: 'khor lo yi ni phyag rgyar grags //
T02TD2631E:131a-19: srin lag rtse sprad tshigs gnyis dgu / khar gzhag pa ni gzung ba ste //
T02TD2631E:131a-20: mthe bong mthe chung rtse sprad dgyed //
T02TD2631E:131a-21: las kyi rdo rjer bshad pa yin //
T02TD2631E:131a-22: de las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas //
T02TD2631E:131a-23: mthe bong snying gar brkyang pa'o //
T02TD2631E:131a-24: mdzum [*mdzub] mo gnyis dgu mche ba la //
T02TD2631E:131a-25: mthe bong gung mo kha 'dra ba //
T02TD2631E:131a-26: gnod sbyin gyi ni yin pa ste //
T02TD2631E:131a-27: mthe chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis //
T02TD2631E:131a-28: mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o //
T02TD2631E:131a-29: snying gar mthe bong mnyam par gshibs //
T02TD2631E:131a-30: rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ste //
T02TD2631E:131a-31: thal sbyar kha yi thad kar gzhag / de las bsnol te rab bskor dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-32: rdo rje bcings pa kha spub dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-33: thal mo kha phye gyen du 'thor //
T02TD2631E:131a-34: g-yas pa'i mtheb bsgreng g-yon pas 'khyud //
T02TD2631E:131a-35: rdo rje bsdams brkyang dbyug pa'o //
T02TD2631E:131a-36: mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa dang //
T02TD2631E:131a-37: mtheb mdzub gnyis ni mdud pa dor //
T02TD2631E:131a-38: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02TD2631E:131a-39: rdo rje bcings pa mdzub mo bsdams //
T02TD2631E:131a-40: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed pa gsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:131a-41: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:131a-42: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje la dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:131a-48: sarba ne tra a'a ta ma su kha /
T02TD2631E:131b-0: aa ho @131b su kha s'a dhu s'a dhu /
T02TD2631E:131b-19: su ti tsi ga / su gandha gre /
T02TD2631E:131b-24: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:131b-25: gung mo sbyar ba byas pa las //
T02TD2631E:131b-26: g-yas pa yi ni gung mo bsgreng //
T02TD2631E:131b-27: g-yon pa'i spu gur bcug nas ni //
T02TD2631E:131b-28: gzhan rnams brkyang pa byang chub mchog / ngan song kun spyong sa la reg / rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin te //
T02TD2631E:131b-29: sh'akya thub pa'i chos bshad mchog / mi 'jigs sbyin pa me tog gi'o /
T02TD2631E:131b-30: spyan gyi mig dang 'dra ba ste //
T02TD2631E:131b-31: m'a ma k'i ni rdo rje 'dra //
T02TD2631E:131b-32: dkar mo padma nyid du bshad //
T02TD2631E:131b-33: autpa la ni sgrol mar dgongs //
T02TD2631E:131b-34: rdo rje blangs nas gsor ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131b-35: lag gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul gnas dang /
T02TD2631E:131b-36: gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba dang //
T02TD2631E:131b-37: legs pa'i se gol snying gar gnas //
T02TD2631E:131b-38: lag gnyis rdo rje dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2631E:131b-39: snying gar nyi ma rab tu ston //
T02TD2631E:131b-40: g-yon pa'i gru mo g-yas pas gzung //
T02TD2631E:131b-41: de las phyir zlog rab tu dgyes //
T02TD2631E:131b-42: shes rab thabs kyi padma dgyes //
T02TD2631E:131b-43: snying gar po ti ral gri phyar //
T02TD2631E:131b-44: mgal me lta bu'i 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2631E:131b-45: rdo rje gnyis ni kha 'gram gnas //
T02TD2631E:131b-46: rdo rje gar gyis bskor nas dgrol //
T02TD2631E:131b-47: spyi bor thal mo mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD2631E:131b-48: go cha'i tshul du bzung nas ni //
T02TD2631E:131b-49: mthe chung gnyis ni mche bar gnas //
T02TD2631E:131b-50: khu tshur gnyis ni dku ru gnas //
T02TD2631E:131b-51: phred ba blangs nas steng du 'phyar //
T02TD2631E:131b-52: de las bi wang mdzub mos bskyod //
T02TD2631E:131b-53: gar ni de las rnam par bzlog / sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pas //
T02TD2631E:131b-54: g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma g-yon pas gzung //
T02TD2631E:131b-55: g-yon pa snying ga g-yas pa yi //
T02TD2631E:131b-56: mtheb srin me tog dpral bar bzlog / de bzhin mig tu yang dag gnas //
T02TD2631E:131b-57: dung phor lta bur dri yis mchod //
T02TD2631E:131b-58: mdzub gnyis lcags kyus mthe chung mdud //
T02TD2631E:131b-59: zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //
T02TD2631E:131b-60: de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya //
T02TD2631E:131b-61: zhags pa'i tshul las rgyab gnyis mnan //
T02TD2631E:132a-1: chen po bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:132a-2: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la /
T02TD2631E:132a-3: thams cad du rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa las /
T02TD2631E:132a-5: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-6: sa gnon dang ni mchog sbyin dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-7: chos 'chad dang ni skyabs mdzad dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-8: spyan gnyis rdo rje khar gnas dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-9: padma lta bu thal mo dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-10: autpala lta bu'i sor mo dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-11: dril bu dkur gtod rdo rje gsor //
T02TD2631E:132a-12: lcags kyus sangs rgyas kun 'gugs shing //
T02TD2631E:132a-13: rdo rje mda' ni bde gshegs 'bigs //
T02TD2631E:132a-14: legs pas sangs rgyas mnyes mdzad cing //
T02TD2631E:132a-15: snying po yis ni dbang bskur mdzad //
T02TD2631E:132a-16: nyi mas sangs rgyas kun snang ste //
T02TD2631E:132a-17: rgyal sras kyis ni sbyin pa rdzogs //
T02TD2631E:132a-18: bzhad pas ba spu ldang mdzad cing //
T02TD2631E:132a-19: spyan gyis gti mug mun pa sel //
T02TD2631E:132a-20: rnon pos shes rab po ti 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-22: gsung bas ljags ni rab tu brkyang//
T02TD2631E:132a-23: las kyis rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-24: gsung bas cho ga 'dzin pas mchog / gnod sbyin la ni mche bar ldan //
T02TD2631E:132a-25: khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings //
T02TD2631E:132a-26: sgeg mo rdo rje gnyis dang ldan /
T02TD2631E:132a-27: phreng bas rin chen phreng ba 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-28: glu mkhan pi wang rnam par ldan //
T02TD2631E:132a-29: gar ni rdo rje rtse gsum ste //
T02TD2631E:132a-30: bdug pa yis ni spos khang 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-31: me tog me tog snod dang ldan /
T02TD2631E:132a-32: snang bas mar me sdong bu 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-33: dri ni dung phor yang dag ldan //
T02TD2631E:132a-34: de bzhin lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:132a-35: lcags sgrog dril bur ldan pa dang //
T02TD2631E:132a-36: phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags //
T02TD2631E:132a-37: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dngos grub la sogs 'byin par 'gyur ba kho na ste /
T02TD2631E:132a-38: de'i skad cig rnams la de dag gi skur bsgoms la /
T02TD2631E:132a-39: bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams la ni /
T02TD2631E:132a-40: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2631E:132a-42: rig pa'i lha mo rnams la ni //
T02TD2631E:132a-43: su ra ta stvam aa ham /
T02TD2631E:132a-45: de nas dbang bskur la sogs pa thams cad bya ste /
T02TD2631E:132a-46: dam tshig dam pa mchog gi rdo rje glu /
T02TD2631E:132a-47: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na //
T02TD2631E:132a-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pas blangs la mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:132a-51: de nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms ba las /
T02TD2631E:132b-0: @132b aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2631E:132b-2: de nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skad cig ma la dus 'byor pa ste /
T02TD2631E:132b-3: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu bsam mo //
T02TD2631E:132b-4: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa'o //
T02TD2631E:132b-5: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po'o //
T02TD2631E:132b-6: de'i steng na lam las gser gyi sa gzhi ser bo gru bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2631E:132b-7: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang /
T02TD2631E:132b-8: rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dpag tshad dang rgyar yangs par bsams la /
T02TD2631E:132b-9: de'i steng du bhr'um dkar bo gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen bo'i khang brtsegs bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:132b-10: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa rta babs bzhi dang dril bu dang /
T02TD2631E:132b-11: drab la sogs pas yongs su brgyan cing /
T02TD2631E:132b-13: ba dan la sogs pas spras pa rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:132b-14: de'i dbus su tsam ser po las gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rin po che dang /
T02TD2631E:132b-15: rdo rjes rnam par spras pa'i 'od sna tshogs dang ldan par bsams te /
T02TD2631E:132b-16: de'i dbus su aa sim aam las seng ge'i khri bskyed pa dang ;
T02TD2631E:132b-17: de bzhin du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gnas su /
T02TD2631E:132b-18: h'um gham h'um las glang po che'i khri dang /
T02TD2631E:132b-19: rin chen tog gi gnas su tr'am aa tr'am las rta'i khri dang /
T02TD2631E:132b-23: me tog rgyas pa'i gnas su aa gam aa las nam mkha' lding gi khri bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:132b-24: de'i dbus seng ge'i khri'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2631E:132b-25: bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed la /
T02TD2631E:132b-26: mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed pa mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs pa de nyid 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:132b-27: de nyid thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:133a-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nyid 'di lta bu @133a * //
T02TD2631E:133a-1: yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas /
T02TD2631E:133a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa ga na ba der gshegs te /
T02TD2631E:133a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas /
T02TD2631E:133a-5: rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam /
T02TD2631E:133a-6: de nas tishtha badzra zhes pa'i sngags kyis se gol brdabs pas slong bar mdzad do //
T02TD2631E:133a-7: de nas sad par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:133a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la /
T02TD2631E:133a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak tsitta pra na men badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:133a-10: zhes pas phyag rgya ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2631E:133a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ma 'tshal na /
T02TD2631E:133a-12: de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2631E:133a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2631E:133a-15: rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs la /
T02TD2631E:133a-16: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di dga' bar bzlas /
T02TD2631E:133a-17: aom tsitta pra ti bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2631E:133a-18: zhes bya bas phung po dang /
T02TD2631E:133a-20: skye mched rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T02TD2631E:133a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa /
T02TD2631E:133a-22: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2631E:133a-23: sems rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba dang /
T02TD2631E:133a-25: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur rtogs so //
T02TD2631E:133a-26: de nas rigs kyi bu sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
T02TD2631E:133a-27: ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te /
T02TD2631E:133a-28: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no //
T02TD2631E:133a-29: der yang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sngags zlos shig dang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro//
T02TD2631E:133b-0: @133b aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2631E:133b-1: zhes bya bas shin tu gsal ba'i byang chub sems bskyed par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:133b-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:133b-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur ba las /
T02TD2631E:133b-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba gang lags pa /
T02TD2631E:133b-7: de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong lags so //
T02TD2631E:133b-8: de nas shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'i sems de nyid la /
T02TD2631E:133b-9: dzany'a na ri mi bi dza h'um /
T02TD2631E:133b-10: zhes ba'i sngags kyi rnam par spros te /
T02TD2631E:133b-11: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer rnam par sna tshogs pa byung ste /
T02TD2631E:133b-12: de chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems ri bo lta bur bcom ste slar rdo rje chen po'i gzugs rtse lnga pa gcig tu gyur nas spyi bo nas thugs kar zhugs te /
T02TD2631E:133b-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
T02TD2631E:133b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyi de legs par sgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig / aom tishtha badzra /
T02TD2631E:133b-15: snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyis de nas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
T02TD2631E:133b-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2631E:133b-17: gsung dang thugs rdo rje snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rjer zhugs so //
T02TD2631E:133b-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dbyings rdo rje dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2631E:133b-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong lags so zhes gsol to //
T02TD2631E:133b-20: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na /
T02TD2631E:134a-1: thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 'grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shig / aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
T02TD2631E:134a-2: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag byas te /
T02TD2631E:134a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2631E:134a-5: mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so ;
T02TD2631E:134a-6: / de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2631E:134a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
T02TD2631E:134a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
T02TD2631E:134a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go //
T02TD2631E:134a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2631E:134a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to //
T02TD2631E:134a-12: de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2631E:134a-15: me tog rgyas pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD2631E:134a-16: de rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2631E:134a-17: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas /
T02TD2631E:134a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed /
T02TD2631E:134a-19: nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur /
T02TD2631E:134a-20: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed /
T02TD2631E:134a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas /
T02TD2631E:134b-0: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir @134b snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang /
T02TD2631E:134b-1: mi shes pa'i las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
T02TD2631E:134b-2: gti mug gis dgug par shes nas bdag 'dir sngar bskyed pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i dbus na seng ge'i khri de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams las grub pa'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi pa'i tshul du bzhugs par gyur par bsgom mo //
T02TD2631E:134b-3: de bzhin du glang po che la sogs pa'i khri'i steng du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba la sogs pa yang phyogs bzhi re re gnas par gyur pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de /
T02TD2631E:134b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dbyings ni bdag go zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:134b-5: de dag gis ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2631E:134b-6: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas spyi bo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2631E:134b-7: aom badzra aa dhishth'a na dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:134b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gnyis nas /
T02TD2631E:134b-10: aom sho dha ni sho dha ni /
T02TD2631E:134b-11: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas spyan phyung ste /
T02TD2631E:134b-12: mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD2631E:134b-13: spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i spyod bas byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:134b-14: de bzhin du yang snyan gnyis nas /
T02TD2631E:134b-15: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni /
T02TD2631E:134b-16: zhes bya ba'i snying po las gos dgar mo phyung ste /
T02TD2631E:134b-17: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:134b-19: zhes bya ba'i snying po las /
T02TD2631E:134b-21: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:134b-22: shangs nas sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2631E:134b-23: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sgrol ma byung ste /
T02TD2631E:134b-24: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:134b-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje bdud kyi dpung ma lus pa 'joms shing sems can rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad gcod par byed pa'i snying po /
T02TD2631E:135a-1: ba ti sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /
T02TD2631E:135a-2: aargha te sam myaksam buddh'a ya /
T02TD2631E:135a-4: aom sho dha ni sho dha ni sarba p'a bam bi sho dha ni shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2631E:135a-5: zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang bcas bar byung ba dang /
T02TD2631E:135a-6: des rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams spro ba'i phyir phyung nas spros la /
T02TD2631E:135a-7: des sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs nas sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud thams cad bcad de /
T02TD2631E:135a-8: slar 'dus ba las 'khor lo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug tu gyur nas gnas bar bsam mo //
T02TD2631E:135a-9: de nas de rnams las ye shes kyi 'od zer byung nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te /
T02TD2631E:135a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
T02TD2631E:135a-11: nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga'i gzugs su gnas pa dang /
T02TD2631E:135a-12: yang sngar gyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i tshad du gyur te /
T02TD2631E:135a-13: de las byung ba'i rang rang gi phyag rgya nyid bsdus pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa'am /
T02TD2631E:135a-14: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud shlo ka stong phrag bco brgyad pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa /
T02TD2631E:135a-15: ae ma ho bdag ni sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2631E:135a-16: mi bskyod rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
T02TD2631E:135a-17: 'gro kun don la sems dpa'i phyir //
T02TD2631E:135a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
T02TD2631E:135a-19: ces bya ba la sogs pas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod de /
T02TD2631E:135a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du /
T02TD2631E:135a-21: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2631E:135a-22: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang rang gi phyag rgya rnam par dag pas gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:135a-23: de'i 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02TD2631E:135a-24: ae ma ho bdag ni sgeg mo ste //
T02TD2631E:135a-25: rol pa'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
T02TD2631E:135a-26: yid 'phrog phyir ni rab sgeg pas //
T02TD2631E:135a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang rang gi ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pas gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:135a-28: sgo rnams su ni gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spros te //
T02TD2631E:135b-0: ae ma ho bdag ni lcags @135b kyu ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-1: thugs rje'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
T02TD2631E:135b-3: rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar brjod //
T02TD2631E:135b-4: ces pa la sogs pa'i ched du brjod pas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur /
T02TD2631E:135b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas mchod pa thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2631E:135b-6: aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri sho dha ni dharm'a te ga ga na sa mungga te ma h'a ya na pa ri g'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2631E:135b-7: zhes brjod pa las rta babs kyi khyams rnams su byams pa la sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:135b-8: rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:135b-9: de la de dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya las thams cad bcing bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2631E:135b-10: chos kyi phyag rgya ni lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs las sprul pa'i sngags nyid do //
T02TD2631E:135b-11: las kyi phyag rgya ni de dag gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa las /
T02TD2631E:135b-12: kun kyang sgeg par ldan pa ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-13: gung mdzub me tog 'dra ba ni //
T02TD2631E:135b-14: byams pa'i phyag rgya yin pa ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-15: g-yon pa dkur btsugs g-yas pa ni //
T02TD2631E:135b-16: gung mdzub mig 'dra don yod grub //
T02TD2631E:135b-17: de las mdzub mo lcags kyur bkug / ngan song kun 'dren yin par bshad //
T02TD2631E:135b-18: de las dbyug pa'i tshul byas pa //
T02TD2631E:135b-19: mya ngan kun 'joms yin pa ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-20: g-yon pa lte bar gnas pa ni //
T02TD2631E:135b-21: glang po'i sna 'dra spos kyi glang //
T02TD2631E:135b-22: g-yon pa dkur brten g-yas pa ni //
T02TD2631E:135b-24: g-yon pa snying ga g-yas pa ni //
T02TD2631E:135b-25: steng du snod 'dzin nam mkha'i mdzod //
T02TD2631E:135b-26: g-yon du lag gnyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:135b-27: ye shes tog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-28: lag gnyis dpral bar bum pa 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:135b-29: bdud rtsi'i 'od kyi yin par bshad //
T02TD2631E:135b-30: g-yon pa'i khu tshur slar gnas la//
T02TD2631E:135b-31: g-yas pa'i srin lag mthe bong gnyis //
T02TD2631E:135b-32: zla ba'i ri mo ltar 'dzin pa //
T02TD2631E:135b-33: zla 'od gzhon nu'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2631E:135b-35: bzang skyong gi ni phyag rgyar grags //
T02TD2631E:135b-36: sor mo rtse bsnol bar phye nas //
T02TD2631E:136a-0: rdo rje rtse gcig snying gar @136a * //
T02TD2631E:136a-2: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2631E:136a-3: g-yon pa snying gar khu tshur gnas //
T02TD2631E:136a-4: g-yas pa mchod sbyin blo gros che //
T02TD2631E:136a-5: g-yon pa lte bar gnas nas ni //
T02TD2631E:136a-6: g-yas pa se gol spobs pa brtsegs //
T02TD2631E:136a-7: g-yon pa dku ru gnas nas ni //
T02TD2631E:136a-8: rin chen khu tshur dpung par 'dzin //
T02TD2631E:136a-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang gi / phyag rgya dam pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD2631E:136a-10: de nas phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02TD2631E:136a-11: de dag gi phyag mtshan dang ldan pa las rang rang gi snying po /
T02TD2631E:136a-14: aom sa manta bha dr'a ya h'um /
T02TD2631E:136a-15: zhes pa'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:136a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyun gcod par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi thugs ka nas /
T02TD2631E:136a-17: rdo rje ye shes byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2631E:136a-19: aom badzra aa dhishth'a ni dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2631E:136a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs lhun gyis grub pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mon khang pa brtsegs pa chen po 'od dang ldan pa'i phyi rol du 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gzugs 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-22: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa la /
T02TD2631E:136a-23: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i nyan thos chen po brgyad dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-24: ser skya la sogs pa'i 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-25: stobs po che la sogs pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-26: seng ge'i mgo la sogs pa pho nya chen po brgyad sprul par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:136a-27: de bzhin du rim pa ji lta bas de'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol la ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:136a-28: yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-29: brgya byin la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba rnams dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-30: nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po brgyad dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-31: smig drug la sogs pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-32: rgyas pa la sogs pa'i drang srong chen po brgyad dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-33: sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i rje bo brgyad dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-34: de dag gi phyi rol du ni 'dzam bu'i gling dang /
T02TD2631E:136a-38: 'gro ba drug tu gnas pa'i sa 'og dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-0: sa bla'i khams thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa thams @136b cad kyang mi dge ba'i rgyun mtha' dag bral ba las dge ba'i lus dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-1: ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis bskul bas mchod pa'i tshogs chen pos mchod cing /
T02TD2631E:136b-2: thams cad dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rgyas par gyur te /
T02TD2631E:136b-3: lag pa'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-4: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par rdzogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:136b-5: de lta bu las sems can thams cad kyi sems dri ma med pa rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa'i dga' ba chen pos mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2631E:136b-6: sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med //
T02TD2631E:136b-7: chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med //
T02TD2631E:136b-9: de phyir gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2631E:136b-10: de nas sems can thams cad dkon mchog gsum la yang dag par song par byas la /
T02TD2631E:136b-11: cho ga thams cad bsdus pa'i mchog la spyad par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:136b-12: rang gi snying ga la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la de'i steng du rang gi sa bon las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-13: de la rang gi sa bon gnas pa'i 'od zer gyis dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ye shes sems dpa'i dbyings thams cad bkug la /
T02TD2631E:136b-14: mdun gyi nam mkha' la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs pa la mchod yon gyis zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-15: nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2631E:136b-16: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2631E:136b-17: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD2631E:136b-18: rnal 'byor gyis rang gi lus la yang dag par zhugs par bya ba ni /
T02TD2631E:136b-19: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2631E:136b-20: zhes brjod pas de kho na nyid gcig par byas nas /
T02TD2631E:136b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2631E:136b-23: zhes pa la sogs pas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2631E:137a-0: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas m'a ma k'i shin tu mdzes pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mchog tu @137a * //
T02TD2631E:137a-1: gyur ba bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa phyung ste /
T02TD2631E:137a-2: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i thugs kar zhugs par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2631E:137a-3: ae ma bdag ni mchod pa bla na med //
T02TD2631E:137a-4: gang phyir rdo rje rgyal po mnyes gyur pa //
T02TD2631E:137a-5: de las sprul pa'i mchod pa bla med kyis //
T02TD2631E:137a-6: sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu rgyas gyur cig / aom satva badzri h'um /
T02TD2631E:137a-7: badzra satva su sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137a-8: zhes rang gi rdo rje glu gdung pa dang bcas pas song bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2631E:137a-9: de'i spro ba'i phyag ni lag pa gnyis gzhal yas khang du brtsegs pa las /
T02TD2631E:137a-10: de'i dbus na mthe bong dang gung mo bzhi gnyis su med par gcig par byas shing padma phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa las rang gi snying gar bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:137a-11: de bzhin du mchod pa bcu drug po thams cad la yang rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa las gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:137a-12: de nas ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thugs ka nas slar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings la m'a ma k'i gong ma'i rdo rje glus mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:137a-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas sangs rgyas spyan phyung nas rin chen tog gi thugs kar phul ba las /
T02TD2631E:137a-14: ae ma rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i glus /
T02TD2631E:137a-15: aom ratna dzi h'um nee tri su satva sam gva ham /
T02TD2631E:137a-16: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gos dkar mo sprul nas sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kar phul nas /
T02TD2631E:137a-17: ae ma padma'i zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2631E:137a-18: aom dharmma badzra h'um mu ni su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137a-19: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas sgrol ma sprul te me tog chen po rgyas pa'i thugs kar phul te /
T02TD2631E:137a-20: ae ma las kyi mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas /
T02TD2631E:137a-21: aom bi sho badzra h'um t'a ra su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137a-22: ji ltar ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bas /
T02TD2631E:137a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar slar phul ba de bzhin du rin po che tog la sogs pas kyang rdo rje'i glu de nyid kyis mchod par bya'o /
T02TD2631E:137a-25: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas sgeg mo sprul te /
T02TD2631E:137a-26: rdo rje sems ma'i thugs kar sprul pa las /
T02TD2631E:137a-27: ae ma bdag ni mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas /
T02TD2631E:137b-0: aom l'a sya su satva sam @137b gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-2: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD2631E:137b-13: yang sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bco lnga sbrul pa las rang rang gi ched du brjod pa'i glus rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i thugs kar phul te /
T02TD2631E:137b-14: de rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ni 'di rnams yin no //
T02TD2631E:137b-16: r'a dz'a su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-17: aom badzra aam ku sha h'um r'a ga su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-18: aom badzra aa ta ma h'um s'a dhu su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-19: aom badzra m'a le h'um ratna su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-20: aom badzra pushpe h'um te dza su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-21: aom badzra p'a sha h'um ke tu su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-22: aom badzra nee tri h'um h'a sa su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-23: aom badzra g'i ti h'um dharma su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-24: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um t'ikshna su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-25: aom badzra spho ta h'um tsakra su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-26: aom badzra bandha ra h'um p'a sha su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-27: aom badzra ni rti h'um p'a sha su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-28: aom badzra gandhe h'um dharma su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-29: aom badzra t'a ra h'um yaksha su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-30: aom badzra t'a ra h'um sinta su satva sam gra ham /
T02TD2631E:137b-31: zhes gdung ba dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:137b-32: de ltar bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis rgyas par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
T02TD2631E:137b-33: rgyal ba thams cad skyed par byed pa'i lha mo lngas theg pa chen po'i bum pa bla na med pa'i dbang /
T02TD2631E:137b-34: aom buddha ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02TD2631E:137b-35: zhes pa la sogs pas bum pa des dbang bskur la /
T02TD2631E:137b-36: de bzhin du yang dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2631E:137b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur la /
T02TD2631E:137b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shr'i aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa:/
T02TD2631E:137b-46: rigs kyi yum thams cad kyi dpral ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138a-0: snying ga rnams su rdo rje @138a * //
T02TD2631E:138a-1: sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2631E:138a-2: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rigs thams cad la rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2631E:138a-3: phyag rgya bzhi la nye bar gnas /
T02TD2631E:138a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'atma nir++ya ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um karma badzra aa /
T02TD2631E:138a-5: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02TD2631E:138a-6: lus thams cad la ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos gsal bar byas nas /
T02TD2631E:138a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par gyur pa nyid do /
T02TD2631E:138a-10: // / de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2631E:138a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las ye shes kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa des snang bar byas pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas /
T02TD2631E:138a-13: yang 'od zer byung ba de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs so //
T02TD2631E:138a-14: de nas sems can gyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad bcad nas slar thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs su gyur to //
T02TD2631E:138a-15: de'i lte ba la gnas pa byang chub kyi sems rin po che yongs su dag pa /
T02TD2631E:138a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa'i 'od zer la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa bzhi ni rang rang gi phyag rdo rje la sogs pa phyag g-yas pa na bsnams shing /
T02TD2631E:138a-17: phyag g-yon pa rdo rje'i lcags kyu 'od zer dang bcas pa bsnams pa'i phyag bzhir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par gnas te /
T02TD2631E:138a-18: sems can thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes dgug par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138a-20: sems dag pa dang bcas par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-0: yid @138b dang bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-1: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-2: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-3: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-4: 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-5: rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-7: bdud dpung ma lus pa rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-8: lkugs pa thams cad smra bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-10: 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-11: bsrung ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-13: dag dang sems mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-17: mngon par 'du mi byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-25: thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-26: sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-28: theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi sems 'jig par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-29: rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-30: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa la skyong bar mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2631E:138b-31: slar sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las sprul pa'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2631E:138b-33: phred ba la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:138b-34: dbang bskur ba las khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sras po nyid du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2631E:138b-35: thams cad du yang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba las kun kyang bskal pa 'di snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar mtshan gcig par gyur te /
T02TD2631E:138b-36: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2631E:138b-37: yang de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu /
T02TD2631E:138b-38: kye ma rnam snang rdo rje yis //
T02TD2631E:138b-39: sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2631E:139a-2: sems can glog bzhin myur du sgrol //
T02TD2631E:139a-3: zhes yongs su bstod pas bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:139a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i khams mthas gtugs pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas nas gnas par byas la /
T02TD2631E:139a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ni rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:139a-6: de dag gis ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to /
T02TD2631E:139a-9: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rtsibs bcu drug pa'i gzugs /
T02TD2631E:139a-10: rdo rje'i dbyings chen po ste /
T02TD2631E:139a-11: thams cad kyang rdo rje'i bu tshur mkhrig ma bsnol la bzlog cing bzlog pas se gol gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:139a-12: se gol de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su gnas pa las rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2631E:139a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang /
T02TD2631E:139a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum thams cad /
T02TD2631E:139a-15: aom badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2631E:139a-16: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2631E:139a-19: dbang du bya ba las rdo rje bsdu bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:139a-20: de nyid du 'khod par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:139a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2631E:139a-22: de nyid mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rgyas par byas la /
T02TD2631E:139a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs rdo rje chen po'i lte ba la gnas par gyur nas /
T02TD2631E:139a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad thugs kyi yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i thig le la gnas par gyur to //
T02TD2631E:139a-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu gnas shing /
T02TD2631E:139a-26: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba thams cad du thogs pa med par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:139a-27: sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:139b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @139b cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa de nyid la sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis ni bdag nyid kyi sems /
T02TD2631E:139b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings su gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i bdag nyid du gyur to //
T02TD2631E:139b-2: de ltar ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2631E:139b-3: de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:139b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rig pa chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu byung ba dang /
T02TD2631E:139b-5: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang rtsa ba'i rig pa chen mo de nyid la brten te rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsams nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa la brtson par byas na /
T02TD2631E:139b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2631E:139b-7: de ltar rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag dang /
T02TD2631E:139b-9: brgya phrag la sogs pa bzlas nas mnyam par gzhag pa las langs par gyur pa'i tshe mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2631E:139b-10: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:139b-11: de nas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2631E:139b-12: rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi bar du phyag rgya thams cad bkrol la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dam pas bkrol zhing /
T02TD2631E:139b-13: badzra mu: zhes pas phyag rgya thams cad nam mkha'i phyogs su bstan la /
T02TD2631E:139b-14: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bdag nyid la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i go bgos la yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas dngos grub blang ste /
T02TD2631E:139b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang /
T02TD2631E:139b-16: ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang bral bar /
T02TD2631E:139b-17: dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur nas /
T02TD2631E:139b-18: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad spangs nas /
T02TD2631E:139b-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sa la gnas par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:139b-20: de nas me tog lag par thogs pas /
T02TD2631E:139b-21: bdag gi phyag rgya sngags rnams dang //
T02TD2631E:139b-22: bsam gtan 'khrul dang nyams pa rnams //
T02TD2631E:139b-23: de bzhin lha tshogs nyams pa kun //
T02TD2631E:139b-24: dkyil 'khor bcas pas bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2631E:140a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis rol mo sna tshogs pa nam mkha' las sgrogs pas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de /
T02TD2631E:140a-3: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD2631E:140a-4: ji ltar mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2631E:140a-5: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD2631E:140a-6: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2631E:140a-7: zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o /
T02TD2631E:140a-9: // / de nas nyams pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa mngon par brtson pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las bya ba nyid de /
T02TD2631E:140a-10: de yang re zhig dang por gnas gtsang ma rang gi yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnams su nyi ma bzang po la rab tu zhugs la ba'i rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2631E:140a-11: dri dang byug ba la sogs pas nye reg byas te /
T02TD2631E:140a-12: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs shing spos kyi dkyil 'khor khru drug pa'am /
T02TD2631E:140a-15: de'i rjes su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying dang ze 'brur ldan pa bris te /
T02TD2631E:140a-16: de'i steng du bum pa dkar po gcig la rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i nang du /
T02TD2631E:140a-20: 'bru la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa bcug ste /
T02TD2631E:140a-21: ras dkar pos mgul la dkris shing me tog phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa bzhag ste /
T02TD2631E:140a-22: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bgegs mthar byed kyi bum pa snga ma lta bu bzhag la /
T02TD2631E:140a-23: dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas btags te /
T02TD2631E:140a-24: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2631E:140a-26: yi ge brgya pas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:140a-27: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa bsgoms la /
T02TD2631E:140a-28: mdun gyi bar snang la nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i sems las padma dmar po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pas khyab par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:140a-29: de'i steng du h'um nag po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od dang bcas pa bsams la /
T02TD2631E:140a-30: de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen por bsams te /
T02TD2631E:140b-2: spyi bo rnams su sangs rgyas spyan dang /
T02TD2631E:140b-5: sgrol ma rnams sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2631E:140b-6: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ha /
T02TD2631E:140b-8: de las rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya bcas pas /
T02TD2631E:140b-10: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas /
T02TD2631E:140b-11: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par sprul la phyag rgya bzhis nye bar spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-12: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2631E:140b-17: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham /
T02TD2631E:140b-19: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2631E:140b-20: de nas mthun pa'i bar du mchod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
T02TD2631E:140b-21: rgyal po'i ni zla ba gsum pa'am /
T02TD2631E:140b-22: blon po'i zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
T02TD2631E:140b-23: dmangs rigs rnams kyi ni zhag bdun pa'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-24: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du ste /
T02TD2631E:140b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la ni 'bum phrag gam brgya phrag re re'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ni thams cad du de'i dbye ba nyid las shes par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:140b-27: tha ma'i tshang la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsungs so //
T02TD2631E:140b-28: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rtsa ba'i sngags nyid de /
T02TD2631E:140b-29: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2631E:140b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2631E:140b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po nyid do //
T02TD2631E:140b-35: shar phyogs kyi bum pa la ni /
T02TD2631E:140b-36: rdo rje dang bcas pas bgegs mthar byed kyi snying po 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-37: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:140b-38: de nyid du rnal 'byor pa sems mchog tu gyur pa rnams la /
T02TD2631E:140b-40: de la lha'i bu'am rgyal po la sogs pas 'bras bu la sogs pa byin pa ni rab tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-41: rang gi ma'am sru mo la sogs pas 'jig rten pa'i kha zas byin pa ni bar ma'o //
T02TD2631E:140b-42: de bzhin du gnyen nam mi gang yang rung bas kha zas ro dang ldan ba'am /
T02TD2631E:141a-0: padma'i sdong bus mgo bcings pa ni tha @141a * //
T02TD2631E:141a-2: rigs ngan shin tu gnag pa rnams mthong na mi rung bar gyur pa nyid kyis sreg blugs la sogs pa mchod sbyin chen po bya ba nyid do //
T02TD2631E:141a-3: de nas rdo rje bzlas pa rdzogs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-4: bum pa de nyid bar snang gi nam mkha' la rdo rje bslang ba'i phyag rgya nyid kyis 'jog par nus pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-5: rdo rje dang dril bu bar snang la gnas par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2631E:141a-6: de ltar rnal 'byor pa zas dkar gsum la longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-7: bud med la sogs pa spangs pas /
T02TD2631E:141a-9: mtshan mo lan drug gi bar du mchod pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-10: gtor ma byas te bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las thams cad grub pa byed pas mar gyi sreg blugs stong du tshang bar bya ste /
T02TD2631E:141a-12: de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2631E:141a-14: // / de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor chen po'i las brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:141a-15: de la rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-16: blon po'am tshong dpon rnams kyi ni khru lnga bcu'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-17: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi khru bcu drug gam /
T02TD2631E:141a-19: de yang re zhig tshes gcig la sogs pa yar gyi ngo'i nyin par mngon bar 'dod pa'i sa phyogs brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2631E:141a-20: rgyal po gdug pa can nam /
T02TD2631E:141a-21: gcan gzan nam chom po'am sbrul la sogs pa brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-22: de nas med par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-23: sa'i bdag po rnams la sa phyogs der dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs pa'i phyir bslang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-24: des byin par gyur pa dang yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-25: dug dang ske tshe dang shing tsher ma can la sogs pas thab khung gru gsum pa'i dbus su bgegs thams cad kyi lus dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-26: ngag dang yid rnam pa gsum rgyas par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-27: de nas bdag dang slob ma dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-28: sa bdag la sogs pa'i tshad du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141a-29: de nas de'i dbus su mtho gang ngam /
T02TD2631E:141a-30: khru gang du brkos pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141a-31: sa dkar snum pa rnams byung ba ni dngos grub bzang por gyur pa'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-0: rus dum la sogs pa byung na ni sa @141b phyogs de spang bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-1: de nas de'i nang du dri chus bkang nas gom pa bdun phyir bskyed de slar 'ongs pa las chu'i ri mo mnyam pa ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-2: de'i sa phyogs der bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i dri chus /
T02TD2631E:141b-3: aom sarba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD2631E:141b-5: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2631E:141b-6: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa las /
T02TD2631E:141b-7: lag pa g-yas pa sa la reg par byas te /
T02TD2631E:141b-8: aom sarba dri dho badzra h'um /
T02TD2631E:141b-9: rdo rje brtan par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2631E:141b-10: rang gi mdun du yi ge bam las gyur pa'i bgegs mthar byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02TD2631E:141b-11: lag par ral gri 'dzin cing rdo rje rgya gram pa'i gom pas bgrod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-12: mtshams rnams su ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog gis 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-13: aom badzra l'a se badzra phrem kha la h'um /
T02TD2631E:141b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-15: khro bo rnams kyi sngags ni ;
T02TD2631E:141b-16: aom sum bha ni sum bha /
T02TD2631E:141b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi tshogs bzhi phyogs bzhir gnas pa'o //
T02TD2631E:141b-18: de nas bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
